      • parseAsSingle

        public static final org.jsoup.nodes.Element parseAsSingle(String html)
        parse given html source to a single Element

        ATTENTION: this method will cause a potential XSS problem, so be sure that you have escaped the passed html string if necessary.

        Parameters:
        html - the html source
        Returns:
        a Element object which contains the dom tree created from passed html source
